channel.title: Lepanto Factions | PVP | JOBS | ECONOMY | EVENTS | 24/7 | GREAT STAFF
channel.description:
[center]IP 176.31.13.251 Port 25565
The BEST Factions Server! Created by real pvpers.
Factions iConomy Vault Jobs PvP Arena ChestShop
Events Wars No lagg Friendly staff
About: We are a new factions server, created by pvpers. We have configured things so it is all fair. The main goal is to have fun. We care about what our players think, so we will most definatly take every suggestion into consideration. We are a professional server, but we want to have as much fun as we possible can. We are Unique.
Server Info: We have friendly and professional staff. There are certain criteria you must have before you can become a staff member.
In total we currently have 22 plugins. The most important ones have been mentioned, but if you like to know a more precise list, send me a message and i'll let you know. If you know another great plugin you think we should have, let us know! We will consider every opportunity to become the best factions server!
We have only one rank for players. It is possible to gain another rank, but this is only possible through a few ways. You can either donate, become staff on our website or server or you can win events a few times.
Joining us will give you a lot of pleasure for sure! We will become a close community where everybody has fun. Players can create amazing bases, as far as 50K blocks away from spawn. We have also installed ChestShop! This plugin allows us to allow players to purchase shops for themself within a specific area where they can start a shop to earn extra cash to buy things with!
Become the strongest, become the best! Rule over the wilderness of Lepanto! During Wars, if your faction wins, each of the competing members will recieve rewards ! !
Donator Info:
We also have 4 different donator ranks!
NOTE: For more detailed perks, please check ingame in the special made section.
Warrior Price: 10$ Perks: More homes, diamond tools every 24 hours, able to use lava bucket
Chief Price: 20$ Perks: More homes, diamond tools every 24 hours, you have a couple of extra commands and you get access to the creative world!
Prince Price: 30$ Perks: More homes, diamond tools every 12 hours, you have a couple of extra commands
King Price: 50$ Perks: More homes, diamond tools and armour every 12 hours, ability to use /workbench
JOIN NOW![/center]
